title: Average retail price for butter in Canada 2015 to 2019
summary: This grouped bar chart represents Average retail price in CAD on the Y-axis. And, its value throughout 12 Months for 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019.
Over the 12 Months, the Average retail price in CAD for 2016 have been increased whereas declined for 2015.
Out of all 5 groups, 2019 had the highest Average retail price in CAD for Month Jul and 2015 had the lowest Average retail price in CAD for Month Jul.
The maximum Average retail price in CAD for 2016 that was found in Month Apr was 10.55 times larger than the minimum Average retail price in CAD observed in Month Dec.
min_summary: This is a grouped bar chart showing Average retail price in CAD on the Y-axis throughout 12 Months for 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019 on the X-axis.
All through the Months, the Average retail price in CAD for 2016 have increased. On the other hand, for 2015 the Average retail price in CAD have declined.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents Average retail price in CAD on the Y-axis. And, its value throughout 12 Months for 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019.
Over the 12 Months, the Average retail price in CAD for 2016 have been increased whereas declined for 2015.
Out of all 5 groups, 2019 had the highest Average retail price in CAD for Month Jul and 2015 had the lowest Average retail price in CAD for Month Jul.
The maximum Average retail price in CAD for 2016 that was found in Month Apr was 10.55 times larger than the minimum Average retail price in CAD observed in Month Dec.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents Average retail price in CAD on the Y-axis. And, its value throughout 12 Months for 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019.
All through the Months, the Average retail price in CAD for 2016 have increased. On the other hand, for 2015 the Average retail price in CAD have declined.
For Month Jul, 2019 had the highest Average retail price in CAD 516.0 among the 5 groups and in Jul, 2015 had the lowest Average retail price in CAD 46.0.
For Month Apr, 2016 had the maximum Average retail price in CAD and it saw the lowest in Month Dec out of all 12 Months.
There is a gap of 449.0 between the highest and lowest Average retail price in CAD found for 2016 in Month Apr and Dec.
Among all 5 groups, 2016 had the gap of 449.0 between the maximum and minimum Average retail price in CAD observed in Month Apr and Dec respectively.
2019 had the maximum Average retail price in CAD out of all 5 groups in Month Jul followed by 2019 in Jul, and the minimum Average retail price in CAD is found for 2015 in Jul.
Averaging all 5 groups 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019, the Month Jul is the maximum Average retail price in CAD and Jun is the minimum Average retail price in CAD.
